messages.message:
some `api-server` pods went down roughly half an hour ago, and this caused several Cypress CI runs to fail (ex: 14008 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14008), 14000 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14000))

crafting-cyp seems to have recovered by now, but any suggestions on how to investigate the pod restarts?
Hey there! I would personally debug this by connecting my sandbox to crafting-cyp and then use kubectl to view pod logs/events -- not sure whether we have this info available through DM
